topics.body:
Editors note: Gasmask is drunk and bitter so take everything he says here with a grain of salt as he will likely regret this all in the morning.

Fuck goddamn everything. No seriously, why is it that everything I love seems to be going out of its way to be goddamned awful. Video games are either fuck awful corporate bullshit or whiny artsy shit so far up its own ass that I could puke, comics very between irritatingly sexist and grandstanding gestures to prove that "no guys we totally get it! See, Thor is a woman now! Do you like us yet tumbler?" and horror movies are all either some stupid fucking serial killer or found footage ghosts and demons.

All while american society seems to be circling the drain as the worst possible people from right (fascist fucking pigs who thrive in the repulsive muck or racism, homophobia, social darwinism and anti-intellectualism) and left (self righteous asshats who claim both that they totally get the desires of the white male while simultaneously telling us we're monstrous ogres who oppress innocent photogenic minorities simply by going about our fucking lives, and totally just want a discussion and not control over all things produced!) war for the right to contaminate all things.

And all this while my brothers and sisters in arms die in fucking stupid wars in a region that is allergic to peace because of both western imperialism and an inability to let go of a fucking grudge while the nation that gabbles on and on and on about how much it supports our troops tosses them aside like a fuck mothering used condom once they get out, scarred and desperate for something resembling a fucking purpose in life.

Then the corporate fucks step in to whine about how they need fucking tax breaks so they can better bend capitalism over and fuck it in the goddamn ass as they suck down corporate well fare and claim to support libertarian ideals.

Nothing in-fucking-furiates me more than people claiming to support the philosophies I love entirely because they think it gives their rich asses license to despoil the working class and the poor.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7
